articles.description: The Beats Studio Buds Plus are $20 off at multiple retailers, including Amazon. We also found deals on the Fitbit Inspire 3 and Insta360’s Link webcam.
articles.content:
The Beats Studio Buds Plus are still available at an all-time low

articles.title: I've run out of patience with the Pixel Tablet as a smart hub - Android Authority
articles.description: One of the selling points of the Pixel Tablet is its ability to double as an Assistant speaker and smart hub. It failed me at both of those.
articles.content: A month ago, when I unboxed the Google Pixel Tablet and installed it in my kitchen as a replacement for my second-generation Nest Hub, I knew I was making a gamble. The kitchen is a shared space and,… [+10450 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft might soon claim 27% of Sony's most active PS5 players - TrueTrophies
articles.description: Should Microsoft absorb Activision's PS5 player share in the pending merger, Sony will find a quarter of its most active players within Xbox control.
articles.content: With the FTC's injunction against Microsoft denied, we move one (legally pending) step closer to a reality in which Microsoft takes control of Activision's PS5 player share and claims ownership of Ca… [+3327 chars]
